page.title: 19GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In order to find out the most popular game in Knightsridge we conducted a survey throughout the school. The game which was enjoyed most by 95% of the children was Chain Tig. In this derivation of the basic game of tig, the chaser endeavours to catch the other children, but when caught they join hands and proceed to catch as many others as possible. Eventually a long chain of children is formed and once they are all caught and holding hands the game begins again with the last caught as chaser. The other popular games include skipping and ball games to which traditional rhymes are sung. The girls enjoy hopscotch and a complicated game which involves jumping over joined elastic bands! The boys prefer more boisterous games such as British Bulldogs and Two Man Hunt.
